        password - Password as a string.
        fullname - User's full name as a string.
        email - User's email address as a string.
        pNum - User's phone number as a string.

      • login

        public static int login(java.lang.String username,
                        java.lang.String password)
        Parameters:
        username - Username as a string
        password - Password as a string
        Returns:
        Returns the user's ID if the user exists on the database and their account is activated. Otherwise, it returns -1.
        To Do:
        It checks if the user is registered in the database and that his/her account has been activated.

        Parameters:
        username - Username as a string
        Returns:
